arts.ttl: Atalanta vs. Bologna, a big six-pointer
arts.sum: Atalanta have lost both of their last two matches against Bologna in the second half of the Serie A season, after a run of eight consecutive wins (and six clean sheets in the process); only once have the Bergamo team suffered more defeats in a row in the second half of the championship against the Rossoblù (seven between 1951 and 1957). Bologna are unbeaten in their last four league games (W3 D1) against Atalanta, after losing 13 of their previous 17 matches (W2 D2); the Emilians could avoid defeat in five matches in a row against the Bergamo side for only the second time, doing so between February 1953 and May 1955 (W4 D1).
